roleset.name: increase engine's speed
roleset.note: REV-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rev' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from rev.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: vroom!
example.text: John revved the motor of his 1972 Pinto.

roleset.name: same as previous, with particle
roleset.note: REV_UP-V NOTES: I might have put both up and to as preps. (from rev.02-v)

example.name: not sure about the parse
example.text: Executive Producers Steve Sohmer and Jeff Bleckner (and writer/producers Ken Solarz and Steve Bello) have revved this show up to the breaking point.
example.arg: Executive Producers Steve Sohmer and Jeff Bleckner (and writer/producers Ken Solarz and Steve Bello)
